 2007-04542007-03-29,  ,  ,  CITIZENSHIP, 
ActImmigration and Refugee Protection Act
PrecisAppointment of KEN S. SANDHU of Brampton, Ontario, to be a full-time member of the Immigration and Refugee Board (Head Office), to hold office during good behaviour for a term of five years; and designation of KEN S. SANDHU to be Deputy Chairperson of the Refugee Protection Division of the Immigration and Refugee Board; effective June 21, 2007.
